name: Sales Data Report
query:
select 
    customer as "Customer Name::200",
    parent as "Invoice No::100",
    posting_date as "Invoice Dt::100",
    item_code as "Part No::100",
    item_name as "Part Description::400",
    qty as "Qty::50",
    rate as "Unit Price::70",
    amount as "Ass. Value::100",
    cgst as "CGST::100" ,
    sgst as "SGST::100" ,
    total as "Grand Total::120"  
from   
    viewsalesdata 
order by 
    parent,
    item_code desc
